text: Hello guys, I'm a new developer here, and I'm getting stuck while developing with HubSpot APIs. Can anyone help me with that??

Hi everyone, I'm new to HubSpot development and I'm currently working on the CMS Certification. One of the things I've been wondering is whether there is a way to host all of our templates on Github and have a CD/CI? Can anyone point me to the right direction if there is such an option? The idea is to  make it easier to collaborate with other team members as they come in
Hi everyone, I'm new to HubSpot development and I'm currently working on the integration of HubSpot with waba(whatsapp Business Api) is there a way to connect waba with HubSpot through code(Python) ?

Yes. One of our clients had a similar use-case where they update their HubSpot through WhatsApp. Is that what you are looking for?
Whats the exact thing you’d like to do?
exactly
I am creating a integration between waba and HubSpot in which I can do cross communication between the 2 platforms
Do you have a python example code to integrate whatsapp with HubSpot or any documentation I don't want to add whatsapp through the HubSpot but through code

I dont have a ready made solution for you in python. You’d have to go through the HubSpot api docs and the whatsapp docs to write a custom API/Script to do this.
Also this would be specific to your product/business.
where are the Whatsapp docs can you please share the link?
Could you DM me? I’d be able to help out better if I understand your product better. Thanks!
HI <@U04L2MPM6CQ> here is the documentation <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/github-integration>
This might also help: <https://product.HubSpot.com/blog/git-and-github-tutorial-for-beginners>
Does anyone know how to access version 2 of the reporting api?
Hello everyone i am kind of stuck with the endpoint to upload files does anyone have an example of a request to that endpoint?
<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/CBA9UA4EN/p1674071158944219>
Hello peeps! I'm trying to figure out how to add a custom class to a dnd_row. Is this possible? Or even a dnd_column or dnd_section would work for my purpose.

Unfortunately, this is one of the most painful gaps in HubSpot CMS’s page builder functionality — there isn’t a way to add custom classes to sections, rows, columns, or (non-custom) modules. You _can_ add them to areas, but that’s typically of pretty limited use.

If you need to target or style something with a custom class in the page builder, your only option is to implement it via a custom module.

Here’s a thread in the HubSpot Ideas forum regarding this topic: <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/HubSpot-Ideas/Add-Class-option-to-Drag-and-Drop-Sections/idi-p/382555|Add Class option to Drag and Drop Sections>
I did find a way to add classes to a section. It just has to be in a section template. It helped, but still pretty limiting. :(

Ah, excuse me — you’re correct. That one slipped my mind. I’m glad you found something, even if less than ideal.

Fortunately, when broad support for `:has()` rolls around, we’ll be able to work around this limitation with some very, very ugly selectors. :~)

Hello!

I'm currently trying to log email responses from our clients.

I've already set up a webhook and functions that allow me to use the '<https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/emails/emailID/?properties=hs_email_text>' endpoint to recieve email text from a given email / thread ID.

However, when I access the hs_email_text fromproperty using a GET request, I receive ALL of the emails attached to that thread.  I wanted to see if there's a way to only return the most recent email (or just the client's responses)
